CustomField.description: Indicates if this Contact is part of the Managed Services funnel
CustomField.formula:
!ISBLANK(First_Quote_Date__c) ||
ISPICKVAL(LeadSource,"Design Guide Download") ||
Owner.UserRole.Name = "Sales Leadership" || Owner.UserRole.Name = "Sales Operations" || Owner.UserRole.Name = "TSE" || Owner.UserRole.Name = "AE-I" || Owner.UserRole.Name = "AE-II" || Owner.UserRole.Name = "AE-III" || Owner.UserRole.Name = "BDR" || Owner.UserRole.Name = "CSAM" || Owner.UserRole.Name = "EAM" || Owner.UserRole.Name = "CSS" || Owner.UserRole.Name = "EBDR" || Owner.UserRole.Name = "EDM" || Owner.UserRole.Name = "EGR" || Owner.UserRole.Name = "IMS" || Owner.UserRole.Name = "Pool" || Owner.UserRole.Name = "SAE" || Owner.UserRole.Name = "Sales Administrator" || Owner.UserRole.Name = "SAM" || Owner.UserRole.Name = "SDR" || Owner.UserRole.Name = "VMS"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Indicates if this Contact is part of the Managed Services funnel Used as a logical filter to pull Contacts in to Outreach (when true)
CustomField.label: Managed Services
